title: Schedule Advising Sessions Solution
explanation: The program validates numeric input for GPA and incident counts before classifying the student with an if/else ladder that mirrors the lesson rubric. A switch statement emits both the advisor message and the follow-up action response, while newline leftovers from scanf are removed so the action prompt reads a meaningful character.
keyPoints: Guard scanf calls and range-check GPA before continuing
Clamp negative incident counts to zero for consistent comparisons
Drive the status label and advisor message from the same status code
Normalize newline leftovers prior to evaluating the action command
Group uppercase and lowercase cases in the follow-up switch
